works.description:
Several texts which I wrote for the web page of my sports club have been copied verbatim, including internal links which still point to pages within our site. For example, the following text which describes which coach teaches which hours in our classes, and is now listed in Google Search results when searching for the names of our trainers:

http://www.sejudoo.info/?kat_name=Tränare_och_grupper
This is a text that I personally wrote that describes which alterations have been made to our sports club training room in recent years. I have only authorized it for use on our club website.
This is a small part of our front page (the top paragraph in the rightmost column). I wrote it to describe our sport. I have only authorized it for use on our club website.

This is a description of why people should join our sports club to train. It is a small part of our front page (second part of rightmost column). I personally wrote it for use on our club website. I have not authorized its use elsewhere.

This is a brief history of my sports club. It is a small part of our front page (third part of rightmost column). I personally wrote it for use on our club website. I have not authorized its use elsewhere.
